title: Pelosi’s J6 Hollywood Moment
itunes:title: Pelosi’s J6 Hollywood Moment
description:
Following a bizarre, newly released documentary clip of Nancy Pelosi saying she wanted to “punch Trump out,” Charlie dives into more news surrounding the J6 Committee, including news the committee plans on issuing a subpoena to President Trump a month before midterms. Charlie unravels the narratives the Left has tried to spin regarding J6, and he also covers another strange story of art vandalism in the name of eco terrorism.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
